titles: Three proper, and wittie, familiar letters: lately passed betvveene tvvo vniuersitie men: touching the earthquake in Aprill last, and our English refourmed versifying With the preface of a wellwiller to them both.
author: Spenser, Edmund, 1552?-1599.
Harvey, Gabriel, 1550?-1631. aut
publisher: By H. Bynneman, dvvelling in Thames streate, neere vnto Baynardes Castell,
notes: The letters signed "Immerito", i.e. Edmund Spenser, and "G.H.", i.e. Gabriel Harvey.
At foot of title: Cum gratia & priuilegio Regi√¶ Maiestatis.
"Tvvo other, very commendable letters, of the same mens vvriting" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: English poetry --  Early modern, 1500-1700 --  History and criticism --  Early works to 1800.
